original_text: Also, you Christians in Philippi know that you already helped me earlier. That was the time when I started to tell people God's good news. When I left Macedonia, you were the only group of Christians who helped me. We were able to help one another, and no other group of Christians did that for me.
korean_text: 빌립보 사람들아 너희도 알거니와 복음의 시초에 내가 마게도냐를 떠날 때에 주고 받는 내 일에 참여한 교회가 너희 외에 아무도 없었느니라

sentences.original_text: Also, you Christians in Philippi know
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 빌립보에 있는 그리스도인 여러분은 알고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: that you already helped me earlier
sentences.korean_translation: 여러분이 이미 이전에 나를 도왔다는 것을

sentences.original_text: when I started to tell people God's good news
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 사람들에게 하나님의 복음을 전하기 시작했을 때

sentences.original_text: you were the only group of Christians
We were able to help one another
and no other group of Christians did that for me
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다른 어떤 그리스도인 그룹도 나를 위해 그렇게 하지 않았습니다
